                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json")
public ChatRoom createPrivateChat(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String postPayload)
        Create a private chat room

        The method expects a POST request with a JSON payload. e.g. {"travelerIds": [1, 2]}

      • getOrCreatePrivateChat

        @RequestMapping(path="/api/private-chats/{travelerId1}/{travelerId2}",
                method=GET)
public ChatRoom getOrCreatePrivateChat(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                          int travelerId1,
                                                                                                                                          @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                          int travelerId2)
        Get or create a private chat room

        Expects two traveler ids as input. The method searches for an existing room based on the traveler ids and will create a new one if none could be found.

        Parameters:
        travelerId1 - int
        travelerId2 - int
        Returns:
        ChatRoom
